page.title: 06MADELEY STAFFS : HOME LIFE
page.content: Many homes in the area are families with children.Wives tend to have jobs: most part-time,a few full-time & a few self-employed.Usually husbands & older children share the chores,& home-life benefits.Few wives admit to any strain. All agree that modern homes are easy to run with the help of automatic washers, tumble-dryers,freezers,pressure-cookers perhaps,dish washers & micro-wave ovens They still do most of the cooking & all the ironing,usually left until evening. Most women are well organised,specially over menus,often planning up to 2 weeks ahead.Daily shopping is rare except for older women.It is a family expedition, undertaken weekly-even fortnightly.So choice of foods & drink is made at the shelf.Families are more health & weight conscious,eat more fibre & less fat.But convenience foods make life easy.Baked beans & ice-cream accompany the bran.
